# Changelog
All Notable changes to `oauth2-dropbox` will be documented in this file

## 2.0.0 - 2017-02-03

### Added
- PHP 7.1 Support

### Deprecated
- Nothing

### Fixed
- Nothing

### Removed
- PHP 5.5 Support

### Security
- Nothing

### Added

- Nothing

### Removed
- Nothing

- Nothing
